captions.text: A young girl lived in a small town near the woods.
And she decided to go pick some pinecones
She wanted to spray them with the gold paint and use them as christmas tree decorations.
She walked this path many times in the past,
But today, it all seemed a bit different.
So many beautiful pinecones were leading her off the main path,
And without realizing, she was walking deeper into the woods.
I hope you like this little fairytale.
If you'd like to know how to make
Check out the tutorials. See you soon!

title: Knitting Fairytale - A Bedtime Story (Short Film)
